file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Example REST API
  description: ''
  termsOfService: http://example.com/terms/
  contact:
    name: Example API Team
    email: apiteam@example.com
    url: http://example.com
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/
    description: Local development server
paths:
  "/api/ping":
    get:
      description: Returns pong!
      operationId: Ping
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Pong response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
  "/api/items":
    post:
      description: Creates a new item
      operationId: CreateItemHandler
      requestBody:
        description: Item name
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Item response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Item"
  "/api/item/{itemId}":
    get:
      description: Gets an item
      operationId: GetItemHandler
      parameters:
        - name: itemId
          in: path
          description: unique identifier for an item
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Item response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Item"
        '404':
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
components:
  schemas:
    Item:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - createdAt
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: integer

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/api/item/{itemId}": at 1:513: get: operation "GetItemHandler": at 1:520: parameters: parse parameter "itemId": at 1:595: at 1:595: path parameters must be required
